title: Inquiry-Based Language Education Design Workshop for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Strengthening inquiry-based learning design competencies in a limited technological environment centered on smartphones

learning_goals: Explain collaboration processes with peer teachers in inquiry-based language lesson design with over 80% accuracy

resources: Digital Content Templates for Language Learning
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
